item.description:
Join Boston Uncorked for their Old World - New World Tasting on Tuesday, September 11 from 7:00-9:00 pm at the new Petit Robert Central for an evening of fine French and American wines paired with award wining cuisine from the Chefs at Petit Robert Central.

Wines from the Rhone Valley of France will be featured.

You will be able to compare and contrast these wines with the exact same varietals grown here in the United States (specifically Grenache, Syrah, Mourvedre, Viognier and Roussanne).

They will also have some Chardonay on hand for those of you who just can not get enough.

Expect a unique learning experience that will be fun.

Capacity and Tickets are limited. Tickets are $39.00 per person. 40 people have already purchased tickets for this event!

Check In is 6:45pm. For more information about the event and the wines go to [url=www.bostonuncorked.com][/url]. In order to attend you must purchase your tickets on line from Boston Uncorked.com in advance. Yes RSVPs who have not purchased tickets before the event will be changed to no.  

MBTA - Green Line to Boylston or the Red and Orange Lines to Downtown Crossing.

Enter Petit Robert Central from 34 Summer Street and proceed upstairs.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVPs with Tickets will be E Mailed. Arrive early and meet in upstairs lobby
item.name: Boston Uncorked - Old World vs New World Wine Tasting at Petit Robert Central
